text: On May 1, 2017, Tax Exempt and Government Entities underwent a reorganization. The new Compliance, Planning & Classiﬁcation function absorbed several employees and groups previously housed in Tax Exempt Bonds, and accepted ownership of this manual. The new IRM 4.70.6, TE/GE Examinations, Classiﬁcation & Case Assignment Procedures, supersedes this manual.
This supersedes IRM 4.81.11, Examination Selection, dated February 14,
Tax Exempt and Government Entities Government Entities and Shared Services Tax Exempt Bonds
